verses.verse: My <WG3450> brethren<WG80>, hold<WG2192> not<WG3361> the faith<WG4102> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, the Lord of glory<WG1391>, with<WG1722> respect of persons<WG4382>.

For <WG1063> if<WG1437> there come<WG1525> into<WG1519> your<WG5216> synagogue<WG4864> a man<WG435> with a gold ring<WG5554>, in<WG1722> fine<WG2986> clothing<WG2066>, and<WG1161> there come in<WG1525> also<WG2532> a poor man<WG4434> in<WG1722> vile<WG4508> clothing<WG2066>;

and <WG2532> ye have regard<WG1914> to<WG1909> him that<WG3588> weareth<WG5409> the fine<WG2986> clothing<WG2066>, and<WG2532> say<WG2036>, <WG846> Sit<WG2521> thou<WG4771> here<WG5602> in a good place<WG2573>; and<WG2532> ye say<WG2036> to the poor<WG4434> man<WG2476>, Stand thou<WG4771> there<WG1563>, or<WG2228> sit2521, Ephesians2 under<WG5259> my<WG3450> footstool<WG5286>;
do ye<WG1252> not<WG3756> make<WG2532> distinctions<WG1252> among<WG1722> yourselves<WG1438>, and<WG2532> become<WG1096> judges<WG2923> with evil<WG4190> thoughts<WG1261>?

Hearken <WG191>, my<WG3450> beloved<WG27> brethren<WG80>; did<WG1586> not<WG3756> God<WG2316> choose<WG1586> them that are poor<WG4434> as to the<WG5127> world<WG2889> to be rich<WG4145> in<WG1722> faith<WG4102>, and<WG2532> heirs<WG2818> of the kingdom<WG932> which<WG3739> he promised<WG1861> to them that<WG3588> love<WG25> him<WG846>?

But <WG1161> ye<WG5210> have dishonored<WG818> the poor<WG4434> man<WG2616>. Do not<WG3756> the rich<WG4145> oppress<WG2616> you<WG5216>, and<WG2532> themselves<WG846> drag<WG1670> you<WG5209> before<WG1519> the judgment-seats<WG2922>?
Do <WG987> not<WG3756> they<WG846> blaspheme<WG987> the honorable<WG2570> name<WG3686> by<WG1909> which<WG3588> ye<WG5209> are called<WG1941>?

Howbeit <WG3305> if<WG1487> ye fulfil<WG5055> the royal<WG937> law<WG3551>, according to<WG2596> the scripture<WG1124>, Thou shalt love<WG25> thy<WG4675> neighbor<WG4139> as<WG5613> thyself<WG4572>, ye do<WG4160> well<WG2573>:
but <WG1161> if<WG1487> ye have respect of persons<WG4380>, ye commit<WG2038> sin<WG266>, being convicted<WG1651> by<WG5259> the law<WG3551> as<WG5613> transgressors<WG3848>.
For <WG1063> whosoever<WG3748> shall keep<WG5083> the whole<WG3650> law<WG3551>, and yet<WG1161> stumble<WG4417> in<WG1722> one<WG1520> point<WG1096>, he is become guilty<WG1777> of all<WG3956>.

For <WG1063> he that said<WG2036>, Do<WG3431> not<WG3361> commit adultery<WG3431>, said<WG2036> also<WG2532>, Do<WG5407> not<WG3361> kill<WG5407>. Now<WG1161> if<WG1487> thou dost not<WG3756> commit<WG3431> adultery<WG3431>, but<WG1161> killest<WG5407>, thou art become<WG1096> a transgressor<WG3848> of the law<WG3551>.
So <WG3779> speak ye<WG2980>, and<WG2532> so<WG3779> do<WG4160>, as<WG5613> men that are<WG3195> to be judged<WG2919> by<WG1223> a law<WG3551> of liberty<WG1657>.
For <WG1063> judgment<WG2920> is without mercy<WG448> to him<WG4160> that hath showed<WG4160> no<WG3361> mercy<WG1656>: <WG2532> mercy<WG1656> glorieth against<WG2620> judgment<WG2920>.

What <WG5101> doth it profit<WG3786>, my<WG3450> brethren<WG80>, if<WG1437> a man<WG5100> say<WG3004> he hath<WG2192> faith<WG4102>, but<WG1161> have<WG2192> not<WG3361> works<WG3361>? can<WG1410> that faith<WG4102> save<WG4982> him<WG846>?
If <WG1437> a brother<WG80> or<WG2228> sister<WG79> be<WG5225> naked<WG1131> and<WG2532> in lack<WG3007> of<WG5600> daily<WG2184> food<WG5160>,

and <WG1161> one<WG5100> of<WG1537> you<WG5216> say<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Go<WG5217> in<WG1722> peace<WG1515>, be<WG2328> ye warmed<WG2328> and<WG2532> filled<WG5526>; and yet<WG1161> ye give<WG1325> them<WG846> not<WG3361> the things needful<WG2006> to the body<WG4983>; what<WG5101> doth it profit<WG3786>?
Even <WG2532> so<WG3779> faith<WG4102>, if<WG1437> it have<WG2192> not<WG3361> works<WG2041>, is<WG2076> dead<WG3498> in<WG2596> itself<WG1438>.

Yea <WG235>, a man<WG5100> will say<WG2046>, Thou<WG4771> hast<WG2192> faith<WG4102>, and I<WG2504> have<WG2192> works<WG2041>: show<WG1166> me<WG3427> thy<WG4675> faith<WG4102> apart<WG1537> from thy<WG4675> works<WG2041>, and I<WG2504> by<WG1537> my<WG3450> works<WG2041> will show<WG1166> thee<WG4671> my<WG3450> faith<WG4102>.
Thou <WG4771> believest<WG4100> that<WG3754> God<WG2316> is<WG2076> one<WG1520>; thou doest<WG4160> well<WG2573>: the demons<WG1140> also<WG2532> believe<WG4100>, and<WG2532> shudder<WG5425>.
But <WG1161> wilt<WG2309> thou know<WG1097>, O<WG5599> vain<WG2756> man<WG444>, that<WG3754> faith<WG4102> apart<WG5565> from works<WG2041> is<WG2076> barren<WG3498>?
Was not<WG3756> Abraham<WG11> our<WG2257> father<WG3962> justified<WG1344> by<WG1537> works<WG2041>, in that he offered<WG399> up Isaac<WG2464> his<WG846> son<WG5207> upon<WG1909> the altar<WG2379>?
Thou <WG991> seest that<WG3754> faith<WG4102> wrought with<WG4903> his<WG846> works<WG2041>, and<WG2532> by<WG1537> works<WG2041> was<WG5048> faith<WG4102> made perfect<WG5048>;

and <WG2532> the scripture<WG1124> was fulfilled<WG4137> which saith<WG1161>, And Abraham<WG11> believed<WG4100> God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> it was reckoned<WG3049> unto him<WG846> for<WG1519> righteousness<WG1343>; and<WG2532> he was called<WG2564> the friend<WG5384> of God<WG2316>.
Ye see3708, Acts6 that<WG3754> by<WG1537> works<WG2041> a man<WG444> is justified<WG1344>, and<WG2532> not<WG3756> only<WG3440> by<WG1537> faith<WG4102>.

And in like manner<WG3668> was<WG1344> not<WG3756> also<WG2532> Rahab<WG4460> the harlot<WG4204> justified<WG1344> by<WG1537> works<WG2041>, in that she received<WG5264> the messengers<WG32>, and<WG2532> sent<WG1544> them out<WG1544> another<WG2087> way<WG3598>?
For <WG1063> as<WG5618> the body<WG4983> apart<WG5565> from the spirit<WG4151> is<WG2076> dead<WG3498>, even<WG2532> so<WG3779> faith<WG4102> apart<WG5565> from works<WG2041> is<WG2076> dead<WG3498>.
